conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway/isometric 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, and interior volumes exposed by removing the roof/ceiling.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable room volumes; good angled view; clean cutaway. Minor simplification at some wall/edge details.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall footprint, central living/dining zone, bedroom placements, and corridor structure largely match. Some openings/partitions appear slightly shifted/simplified compared to the 2D plan, and not all window/door locations can be verified as exact.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present (beds, sofas, dining table), kitchen counters/appliances suggested, and bathroom fixtures present. Some elements are simplified blocks.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with distinct walls/floors and good visibility; minimal artifacts. Monochrome materials reduce differentiation slightly but geometry remains readable; background is clean.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window placements and sizes appear simplified or not perfectly aligned with the 2D plan (exact openings per wall not fully consistent/confirmable).
Minor layout proportional differences in a few partitions/corridor segments (overall adjacency is correct but some wall lengths/offsets look adjusted).

summary: A true and clean cutaway 3D conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with only minor-to-moderate simplifications in some partitions and opening placements.
